item.description:
http://www.frenchculturalcenter.org/index.cfm/events/scheduled-events/atlas-soul1/

Event Information

Wednesday, Oct 24, 2012
6:30 PM - 8:30 PM

At The French Cultural Center
Map/Directions

Member Price: $10.00
Non-Member Price: $15.00
RSVP Required (call 617-912-0400)

 

On Wednesday, October 24th, Atlas Soul, a cross cultural band based in Boston is celebrating the fall season at the French Cultural Center with a rare performance of French classic songs like “Les Feuilles Mortes,” “Le Jazz et la Java,”  “Les Copains D’abord,” as well as some of their own original award-winning tunes like “L’amour en Banlieue” and many more.

Join us to mix and mingle while enjoying French wine and listening to a truly world music band!

21+ only.

 

About Atlas Soul
Atlas Soul incorporates many genres including Moroccan Raï, Chaabi, Reggae, French jazz, Samba, Funk, and Rock.

They have won or placed the Independent Music Awards (3 times), the Billboard World Song, The Unisong International, Global Rhythm Magazine, Just Plain Folks Music Awards, the Boston Music Awards and many more.

They have released 4 CDs and have performed at some of the most prestigious venues and festivals like the Montreal Jazz Festival, the Kennedy Center and countless more around the world.
item.how_to_find_us: Boston French cultural Center on the left when you come in.
item.name: Atlas Soul Play French/International Music + French wine
